subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony was dominant again, scoring 34 points, and the Knicks outscored the Celtics by 45-23 in the second half to take a 2-0 series lead.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony was dominant again, scoring 34 points, and the Knicks outscored the Celtics by 45-23 in the second half to take a 2-0 series lead.
